name: smart-therapy
description: Indonesian Hypnotherapy AI System - A comprehensive web platform for licensed Indonesian hypnotherapists

scripts.build: pnpm run build:frontend && pnpm run build:backend
scripts.lint: pnpm --filter smart-therapy-frontend lint && pnpm --filter smart-therapy-backend lint
scripts.lint:fix: pnpm --filter smart-therapy-frontend lint:fix && pnpm --filter smart-therapy-backend lint:fix
scripts.format: pnpm --filter smart-therapy-frontend format && pnpm --filter smart-therapy-backend format
scripts.format:check: pnpm --filter smart-therapy-frontend format:check && pnpm --filter smart-therapy-backend format:check
scripts.type-check: pnpm --filter smart-therapy-frontend type-check && pnpm --filter smart-therapy-backend type-check
scripts.test: pnpm --filter smart-therapy-frontend test && pnpm --filter smart-therapy-backend test
scripts.test:watch: pnpm --filter smart-therapy-frontend test:watch && pnpm --filter smart-therapy-backend test:watch
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules frontend/node_modules backend/node_modules frontend/.next backend/dist
scripts.setup: pnpm install && pnpm --filter smart-therapy-frontend install && pnpm --filter smart-therapy-backend install
scripts.pre-commit: pnpm lint:fix && pnpm format && pnpm type-check
scripts.db:fresh: cd backend && mikro-orm schema:drop --run && mikro-orm schema:create --run && mikro-orm seeder:run

author: Smart Therapy Team
